RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>less than 1 month</treatment_length> <satisfaction>1</satisfaction> <effectiveness>1</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Birth Control</condition> <comment>I started taking this drug about 2 weeks ago and boy not only did my hair start falling out but my sex drive plumeted as well I have had the MOST horriable mood swings I will just sit and cry for no reason at all.
